description: Main entry point and core logic of the Flutter audiobook library app, including UI screens, providers, data models, and database helpers.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget initializing providers and MaterialApp theme.

classes.name: MainScreen
classes.description: Main screen with bottom navigation for Store, Library, and Player screens.

classes.name: Audiobook
classes.description: Data model for representing an audiobook item.

classes.name: AudiobookDatabaseHelper
classes.description: Singleton helper class for SQLite database interactions storing library and playback position.

classes.name: StoreScreen
classes.description: UI screen to browse and purchase audiobooks from a mock catalog.

classes.name: PurchaseButton
classes.description: Button widget for purchasing (adding to library) an audiobook.

classes.name: LibraryScreen
classes.description: UI screen showing user's library and options to remove or select books.

classes.name: PlayerScreen
classes.description: Audio player UI with playback controls, progress, and book info.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; initializes Flutter binding and database, then runs app.

methods.name: loadBook
methods.description: Loads a selected audiobook into the player, retrieving its last known position.

methods.name: setPosition
methods.description: Sets and persists the current playback position.

methods.name: skip
methods.description: Skips forward or backward by specified seconds in the current audiobook.

methods.name: clearPlayer
methods.description: Clears current audiobook and position from the player state.
